name: Who Cares?
description: It's a crappy RPG Maker MV game I made. I was passionate at the start but quickly lost interest at the end. I usually just delete my projects, but figured I actually got far in this, and just ended it. This game represents what I see and think in my mind. It's also a Non-RPG RPG Maker game, so if you expect crappy basic RPG battles, you are wrong.
